title: SaffireTix
description:
Do you have events? SaffireTix™ combines three points of sale into one system:
Online print-at-home QR tickets you can scan at the gate
Advance sales with QR hard tickets
QR stickers and gate sales via cash and credit card.
You get amazing, real-time reporting on desktop and mobile, as well as nightly emailed reports, and it’s all integrated with Saffire. You work with a partner you trust, and your customer gets a streamlined, safe experience.
